posts.title: India's Ritu Phogat to face Thailand's Stamp Fairtex in MMA finals on 3 December
posts.desc: Phogat, ranked fourth, says she is leaving no stone unturned in preparing for her upcoming bout in the 48kg category at the Singapore Indoor Stadium.

posts.title: ATP urges 'communication' not boycott over Peng Shuai row, shies away from backing WTA's stance
posts.desc: ATP chairman Andrea Gaudenzi admitted concerns over the welfare of 35-year-old Peng who has not been seen for weeks following her allegations of sexual assault against a former Communist Party leader

posts.title: Ralf Rangnick aims to improve Manchester United's defensive 'balance'
posts.desc: Rangnick's deal is set to see him move into a consultancy role at Old Trafford after the end of the current campaign

posts.title: Formula 1: Mercedes' Lewis Hamilton says 'not comfortable' with racing in Saudi Arabia
posts.desc: Hamilton aired his views in a news conference in Jeddah where the penultimate race of the 2021 Formula One season takes place on Sunday.

posts.title: Men's Junior Hockey World Cup 2021: Belgium down Spain in shoot-out to set up 5-6th play-off match against Netherlands
posts.desc: Last edition runners-up Belgium will face Netherlands, who thrashed Malaysia 9-3 in another classification match, in the fifth-sixth play-off.

posts.title: Former controversial world athletics chief Lamine Diack dies at 88
posts.desc: Diack, who was president of the IAAF, now World Athletics, from 1999 to 2015, was convicted in Paris in September 2020 on multiple charges of corruption during his tenure

posts.title: Chinese netizens dodge censors to discuss Peng Shuai case online
posts.desc: The authorities have been quick to catch up, swiftly identifying and deleting new coded posts related to Peng -- even blocking the Douban page for the Korean drama "Prime Minister & I", where users had retreated to discuss Peng's claims against Zhang

posts.title: Stamp Fairtex more dangerous compared to Ritu Phogat, feels Bi Nguyen ahead of ONE Atomweight Grand Prix Final
posts.desc: The Indian wrestler-turned-MMA fighter, currently ranked fourth, faces the No 2-ranked Fairtex in the final of the Women’s Atomweight World Grand Prix Championship Final at the Singapore Indoor Stadium. The winner of this bout will then go on to face Angela Lee for the atomweight world title next year.

posts.title: Gennady Golovkin's world title bout in Japan postponed over border ban
posts.desc: The hard-hitting Kazakh boxer was set to return to the ring after a year's absence with a unification bout against Japanese WBA super-titlist Murata on 29 December in Saitama, north of Tokyo.

posts.title: Formula 1: Lewis Hamilton ‘more relaxed than ever’ as title battle with Max Verstappen intensifies
posts.desc: Hamilton, eyeing an unprecedented eighth world title, trails Verstappen by eight points with just two races left — on the streets of Jeddah on Sunday and at the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix next weekend.

posts.title: Premier League: Ronaldo scores 800th goal as Carrick signs off as caretaker United boss by beating Arsenal
posts.desc: Carrick was taking charge for the final time as caretaker manager with new interim boss Ralf Rangnick watching from the stands and announced after the match he will leave the club rather than return to his coaching role.

posts.title: Afghan national boxing team on the ropes after fleeing Taliban rule
posts.desc: Even amid the relentless bustle, their new life in Serbia is an island of stability compared to the chaos back home

posts.title: 'Nobody would be comfortable playing in China', says world number 2 Daniil Medvedev
posts.desc: The ATP, which controls the men's tour and organises four tournaments in China at the back end of each year, on Thursday refused to join the WTA boycott

posts.title: BWF World Tour Finals: Kidambi Srikanth loses to Lee Zii Jia, bows out of tournament
posts.desc: The former world no. 1 Indian was no match for Lee, the reigning All England champion, going down 19-21 14-21 in 37 minutes to end his campaign

posts.title: Serie A: Tolgay Arslan’s stoppage-time strike helps Udinese hold Lazio to thrilling, high-scoring draw
posts.desc: Lazio thought they had won a memorable encounter at the Stadio Olimpico when Arslan curled home a superb first-time strike from Fernando Forestieri's free-kick

posts.title: Davis Cup: Daniil Medvedev leads the way as Russia defeat Sweden to enter second successive semi-final
posts.desc: Russia will on Saturday face Germany for a place in Sunday's final with Novak Djokovic's Serbia meeting neighbours Croatia in the other semi-final on Friday.

posts.title: ISL 2021-22: Hyderabad FC claw back from a goal down to hold Jamshedpur to a 1-1 draw
posts.desc: Greg Stewart scored a fine solo goal in the 41st minute to put Jamshedpur ahead before Bart Ogbeche (56') found the net after a well worked move at the edge of the box with Joao Victor.

posts.title: WTA chief Steve Simon sticks to his guns in Peng Shuai case
posts.desc: After threatening to cancel tournaments in China, the WTA on Wednesday announced "the immediate suspension of all WTA tournaments in China, including Hong Kong"

posts.title: Milan's Simon Kjaer suffers knee ligament damage; to be out for months
posts.desc: Kjaer was stretchered off early on in Milan's 3-0 win at Genoa on Wednesday and the Serie A giants revealed in a statement he would be going under the knife to repair the damage
